entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Square - 4 1/2"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 19.85

Simpli-EZ Square - 41/2" is a 4 1/2" x 4 1/2" square ruler and is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Darlene Zimmerman, the ruler is marked in black for right handed users and in red for left handed users. The markings are in 1/4" increments and the numbers read correctly any way the ruler is turned. There are 45 degree lines for centering when squaring up blocks. This ruler is useful for cutting squares and trimming blocks to size.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Available)

s:variant.title: 4 1/2" / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkgs/Box / As Shown

entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Flip-n-Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 72.81

Simpli-EZ Flip-n-Set is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Darlene Zimmerman, it can cut triangles to setting blocks on point. It folds open to cut triangles for 4" to 16" blocks. There is no math to figure. It can be used to square corners on quilts.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

s:variant.title: As Shown / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkg/Box / As Shown

entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Tri-Mate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 23.95

Simpli-EZ Tri-Mate is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Joy Hoffman, it is ideal for use with a rotary cutter. You can cut triangles 4 times as wide as they are tall and with finished heights from 1/2" to 3". Use with Tri-Recs tool for more design options.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

s:variant.title: As Shown / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkg/Box / As Shown

entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Pineapple
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 66.33

Simpli-EZ Pineapple is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Kimberly Einmo, you can make pineapple blocks with no math, no trapezoids, no stress and make blocks in almost unlimited range of sizes. Make both traditional and non-traditional pineapple blocks. It also makes log cabin, album style and many other quilt blocks quickly and easily.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

s:variant.title: As Shown / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkg/Box / As Shown

entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Piping Wizard
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 46.12

Simpli-EZ Piping Wizard is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Linda McGehee allows you to cut perfect seam allowances after covering the piping cord. It can be used with multiple sizes of cording and seam allowance. Always a perfect seam allowance. After making the corded piping, trim the seam allowance to the perfect 1/4" or 1/2". Great for working with piping for quilts, garments and craft projects.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

s:variant.title: As Shown / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkg/Box / As Shown

Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 25.62

Simpli-EZ 30 Degree Triangle is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Darlene Zimmerman, for Dresden plates and fans, it eliminates the need for center applique, can be finished with curved edges or points, has many sizes in this one tool and uses even size strips.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Double Wedding Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 38.63

Simpli-EZ Double Wedding Ring is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Darlene Zimmerman, it is one tool that centers, melons and squares. Inside curvers are cut as easily as outside curves using this tool. A and B units can be cut from strips or squares.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

s:variant.title: As Shown / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkg/Box / As Shown

entry.title: Wrights Simpli-EZ Jelly Roll Ruler 5" x 10"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 34.17

Simpli-EZ Jelly Roll Ruler is 5" x 10" and is available 1 piece per package, 3 packages per box. Designed by Kimberly Einmo, it is perfect for cutting 10" Layer Cke Squares into many coordinating units for use with Jelly Rolls, Honey Buns and Charm Packs. The "Ghost Shadow" on the 1 1/2", 2 1/2" and 5" lines in Aqua Mint ink line up perfectly for: cutting 1 1/2" Honey Bun Strips into Squares and rectangles; cutting 2 1/2" Jelly Roll Strip into squares and rectangles; and cutting 10" Layer Cake squares into squares, rectangles and triangles.
(Product Characteristic: Sewing; Quilting Tools) / (Fabric Content: Not Applicable)

s:variant.title: 5" x 10" / 1 Pc/Pkg; 3 Pkg/Box / As Shown

entry.title: Wrights Dear Jane Book
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrights
Type: Sewing & Quiltinq
Price: 16.05

Our dear jane book comes with 1 piece per package. 1 package per box. Product Details: Calling all lovers of quilts, patterns and quilt history! In Dear Jane, a twentieth century quilting teacher meets a nineteenth century quiltmaker. Brenda Manges Papadakis has lovingly recreated the two hundred twenty five patterns from the celebrated Jane A. Blakely Stickle quilt. Accompanying the patterns are a remarkable series of letters from Brenda to Jane, drawing us into the historical context of Jane's achievement and connecting her to our quilting lives today. Among the patterns and letters you will find a dozen quilts from the 1990's, all inspired by Jane's supreme example of quiltmaking artistry in 1863. Brenda's meticulous research has been a devoted labor of love, not only for a splendid quilt but also for the woman who created it. You will be moved by her letters to Jane, and enlightened about the times in which she lived. You will also be kept delightfully busy with the large collection of block which challenge you to create your own Baby Jane quilt. *© 2002 EZ Quilting® by Wrights® West Warren, MA 01092
(Product Characteristic: How To Books; Kits) / (Fabric Content: 100% Paper)

s:variant.title: As Shown / 1 Pc/Pkg; 1 Pkg/Box / As Shown
